meanings.definition: A person who does not write.
meanings.sent1: The nonwriter preferred drawing pictures instead of writing stories.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a nonwriter, so he expresses himself through music instead.
meanings.sent3: The nonwriter joked that their pen ran away every time they tried to write.
meanings.sent4: In a world of authors, she stood out as the lone nonwriter.
meanings.sent5: The nonwriter's desk was filled with art supplies instead of notebooks.

meanings.definition: Not involving or related to writing.
meanings.sent1: The nonwriter club focused on activities like painting and photography.
meanings.sent2: Her nonwriter friends enjoyed outdoor adventures more than reading books.
meanings.sent3: The nonwriter party had no pens or paper in sight, only games and music.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a nonwriter space, filled with images and sounds instead of words.
meanings.sent5: The nonwriter workshop taught participants how to express themselves through other mediums.
